name: GastSchmidtKnosche_SF

V.expression: (V * V - np.pi * np.pi * tau * tau * r * r + eta + J * tau * r + I - A + cr * Cr + cv * CV) / tau

references: [Gastetal_2020]	Gast, R., Schmidt, H., & Knösche, T. R. (2020). A mean-field description of bursting dynamics in spiking neural networks with short-term adaptation. Neural Computation, 32(9), 1615-1634.
